thread.title: Fans hit out at "insensitive" Geordie Shore trailer that shows Gary Beadle 'giving birth' to new cast members
thread.title_full: Fans hit out at "insensitive" Geordie Shore trailer that shows Gary Beadle 'giving birth' to new cast members

author: Vicki Newman
title: Fans hit out at "insensitive" Geordie Shore trailer that shows Gary Beadle 'giving birth' to new cast members
text:
Fans hit out at "insensitive" Geordie Shore trailer that shows Gary Beadle 'giving birth' to new cast members Some people believe the trailer is insensitive to Gaz's ex Charlotte Crosby, who suffered an ectopic pregnancy Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now New Geordie Shore cast members unveiled Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Geordie Shore fans have hit out at an "insensitive" new trailer which sees Gary Beadle giving birth. 
There has been an online backlash to the clip from people who believe it is insensitive given the fact that Gaz's ex-girlfriend Charlotte Crosby suffered an ectopic pregnancy. 
Charlotte has previously opened up about the heartbreaking time, admitting the pain got so bad, she could barely walk and had to be rushed to hospital for an emergency operation. 
It was made worse because her ex Gaz was filming Ex on the Beach at the time she found out - and just days later, claims emerged he had cheated with her rival Jemma Lucy, as well as enjoying a threesome on the show. Read More A heavily pregnant Gaz appears in new promo for Geordie Shore (Photo: MTV) He is seen 'giving birth' to new cast members in the trailer (Photo: GeordieShore/Instagram) 
Now fans believe the new trailer could cause even more upset. 
In the clip, Aaron Chalmers and Nathan Henry push a 'heavily-pregnant' Gaz into hospital in a wheelchair, before he's put in a bed in the maternity suite. 
Aaron asks Gary if he's alright, and the reality star - who is sweating profusely - shouts back, "Of course I'm not. I'm giving birth!" 
Chloe Ferry and Marnie Simpson are then revealed to be the doctors handling the birth, with Marnie telling him to "shut up and push". Chloe and Marnie are the doctors (Photo: GeordieShore/Instagram) Some fans believe the trailer is insensitive to Charlotte (Photo: GeordieShore/Instagram) 
Gaz lets out a high-pitched scream and Aaron begins puffing on gas and air as Chloe pulls a variety of items, such as a traffic cone and a bucket of fried chicken, from between Gaz's legs. 
Before long, Gaz begins 'giving birth' to the new Geordie Shore cast members, before letting out yet another high-pitched scream that can apparently be heard from space. 
The message 'The family's getting bigger' pops up on the screen as the newbies dance around and Chloe starts tucking into the fried chicken Gaz just 'birthed'. Gaz's ex Charlotte suffered an ectopic pregnancy while he was away filming Ex On The Beach (Photo: MTV) New cast members start 'popping out' (Photo: GeordieShore/Instagram) 
After the video was posted online, people began commenting on how "insensitive" it was. 
One wrote: "wow @gazgshore giving birth... bit insensitive to Charlotte don't you think?" 
"bit f*d up since with the pregnancy thing with charlotte & they got gaz doin this," said another. [sic] 
And another commented: "not sure if you guys could be more insensitive?" 
"bit tactless considering his history with Charlotte," said another fan. Read More The new cast members dance around the hospital room (Photo: GeordieShore/Instagram) The new cast members will join old faces (Photo: MTV) 
However, there were people who found the video hilarious, and posted that they couldn't wait for the show's return. 
The MTV reality show is back for its 14th series and will include a LOT of new faces when it returns on Tuesday, March 28. 
Cast members Gaz, Marnie , Sophie Kasaei, Chloe, Aaron, Nathan and Marty McKenna will welcome eight new 'workers' to help them out as they party in and around Newcastle. 
Scott ' Scotty T ' Timlin will be returning to the show as well, although fashionably late. Gary has been in the show since it began in 2011 (Photo: MTV) 
Abbie Holborn, Billy Philips, Chelsea Barber, Elettra Lamborghini, Eve Shannon, Sam Bentham, Sarah Goodhart and Zahida Allen will join the line-up. 
MTV did not want to comment when contacted by Mirror Celeb. 
We have also contacted Gaz and Charlotte's representatives for comment. 
* Geordie Shore returns to MTV at 10pm on Tuesday, March 28 Like us on Facebook
